name: ngdropover
author: Ricky Sandoval <ricky.sandoval92@gmail.com> and Tony Smith <tony@naptown.com>
description: ngDropover is an Angular 1.x directive that is a feature-rich, event-driven solution for dropdowns, popovers, tooltips, or any other time you need a trigger or triggers to hide-show elements. The only dependency is AngularJS and your imaaginaaaationnnn!
